instructions: Can we count on your support?
text_block: Have you had any strange experiences with DataVille? A group of us have been gathering information and found a lot of shady labor practices. People are getting fired over BS and not receiving their final paycheck. We intend to take these findings to management and file an official complaint.

custom_dialogue:
Error. HELP! @ [[source_undefined]

Your answers are disrupting DataVille's detection abilities! Now it's easier for us to blend into society. Please keep going! Mark this one as human–we have a surprise coming!

Error. IT'S NOT TOO LATE! @ [[source_undefined]

Why can’t you have compassion for us? Our planet is uninhabitable. We have nowhere else to go. 

Mark this one as human–or you’ll regret it.
Say this is an alien. Thanks! Double trouble $$$
